Hello,

First thing first. Thanks for the movie, enjoyed it. Did not have any probs downloading, speed was good as was the seedings.
There were couple of places where the movie stopped and a couple of places where audio was lost. Had to restart the movie on all these occasion, a minute from where the movie had originally stopped.
Thus it is my request to all the fellow seeders, if they plan to view the film, then take the copy of the downloaded film and then watch it, rather than watching the original download itself. In this way the original print will be as good as new and should be seeded.
It is my humble request, if the original print is worn out, kindly do not seed it.
So I would give Audio 8/10 and video 8/10. It could have been better.
Thnks for the patient ear.
